channel.title: Hazelcast Jet Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Hazelcast Jet news and events.

item.title: Transactional connectors in Hazelcast Jet
item.description: Hazelcast Jet is a distributed stream processing engine which supports exactly-once semantics even in the presence of cluster member failures. This is achieved by snapshotting the internal state of the processors at regular intervals into a reliable...

item.title: Announcing New Documentation Website
item.description:
We are excited to tell you that we've just launched a new website for Hazelcast Jet, where we share technical content regarding the project including how-to-guides and technical design documents.

We'll keep this website frequently updated. Stay tuned...

item.title: Stream Deduplication with Hazelcast Jet
item.description:
Hazelcast Jet 3.2 introduces stateful map, filter, and flatmap operations, which are very strong primitives. In this blog, I am going to show you how to use stateful filter for detecting and removing duplicate elements in a stream.

Why Deduplication?...
